pattern_file:
name: my-app
components:
- id: 503b2bea-bdcf-44c4-b91d-819402fb993f
  displayName: httpbin
  schemaVersion: components.meshery.io/v1beta1
  model:
    schemaVersion: models.meshery.io/v1beta1
    name: kubernetes
    registrant:
      kind: artifacthub
    category: 
      name: Orchestration & Management
    model:
      version: v1.25.2
  component:
    kind: Pod
    apiVersion: v1
  configuration:
    metadata:
      # namespace: default
    spec:
      selector:
        match Labels:
          app: test
          test: app
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: task-pv-container
        ports:
        - container Port: 80
          name: http-server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - name: wasm
        persistent Volume Claim:
          claim Name: test
